p: It is advisable monitoring of the following blood parameters (full blood count including platelet count, ALT/AST, LDH, fibrinogen, D-dimer, ferritin, C-reactive protein and IL-6) at different time points: immediately before 1 st infusion, immediately before 2 nd infusion, 24h after 2 nd infusion, 36h after 2 nd infusion.
